prng.generator

Class BaseRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.SecureRandomSpi
      • prng.generator.BaseRandom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NistCipherRandom, NistHashRandom, NistHmacRandom

    public abstract class BaseRandom
extends SecureRandomSpi
    Common NIST secure random number functionality.
    Author:
    Simon Greatrix
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseRandom

        protected BaseRandom(SeedSource source,
                     int resistance,
                     int seedSize,
                     int spareSize)
        New instance.
        Parameters:
        source - source of seed information
        resistance - number of operations between re-seeds
        seedSize - the number of bytes in a re-seed.
        spareSize - the maximum space required for spare bytes

                                  byte[] nonce,
                                  byte[] personalization,
                                  int minEntropy,
                                  int desiredEntropy)
        Concatenate the standard material inputs
        Parameters:
        entropy - the supplied entropy
        nonce - the supplied nonce
        personalization - the supplied personalization
        minEntropy - the minimum bytes of entropy
        desiredEntropy - the desired bytes of entropy if none supplied
        Returns:
        concatenated data
